review_blob: Aroma of strong malt notes of char, caramel, and dark chocolate along with rich hop notes. Color is black with little to no transparency.  Light head. Nice blend of sweetness and bitterness.  Creamy and lively carbonation. First black IPA Ive had and thought it was exceptional. Interesting balance of strong malt and hop characteristics. Very tasty and satisfying.
beer_name: Stone Sublimely Self Righteous Black IPA

review_blob: Appearance is clear with Amber color. Aroma is very rich in hop notes with clear citrus notes upfront along with lingering caramel, vanilla, musty, leather notes. Heavy bitterness with moderate sweetness. Full and smooth with long finish. One of the best imperial ipas ive had.

Bottle from brewery. Clear visibility, after leaving bottom sediment in bottle. Nice gold in color. Complex and balanced flavor profile. Banana, pear notes. Black pepper note. Slight earthiness. Clean, bright mouthfeel. Bitterness lingers. Overall, nice Belgian ale. Great beer for capping off an active day in warm weather.
